description: Destroy ALL minions with 3 or less Attack.

name: Chrysalis Burst
description: Summon a random Egg in 4 random spaces.

name: Natural Selection
description: Destroy ANY minion with the lowest Attack or tied for the lowest Attack.

name: Decimate
description: Destroy ALL minions that are not nearby any General.

name: Juxtaposition
description: Switch positions between ANY two minions.

name: Breath Of The Unborn
description: Deal 2 damage to all enemy minions. Fully heal all friendly minions.

name: Auroras Tears
description: This turn, your General gains +2 Attack for every equipped artifact.

name: Deathfire Crescendo
description: Give a friendly minion, "Deathwatch: Gains +2/+2."

name: Chromatic Cold
description: Dispel a space. If there is an enemy on that space, deal it 2 damage.

name: Frostfire
description: Give a friendly minion +3 Attack. If it is Vespyr, also give it +3 Health.

name: Avalanche
description: Deal 4 damage to everything on your starting side of the battlefield and Stun them.

name: Boundless Courage
description: Give a friendly minion +2 Attack. It takes no damage this turn.

name: Mesmerize
description: Teleport an enemy one space.

name: Flash Freeze
description: Deal 1 damage to a minion and Stun it.

name: Mark of Solitude
description: One minion becomes 5/5. It can no longer attack Generals.

name: Eight Gates
description: Spells you cast this turn that deal damage deal +2 damage.

name: Aspect of the Ravager
description: Transform ANY minion into a 3/3 Ravager with no abilities.

name: Aspect of the Wyrm
description: Transform ANY minion into a 4/4 Whyte Drake with Flying. Nearby friendly minions gain Flying.

name: Aspect of the Mountains
description: Transform ANY minion into a 5/5 Seismic Elemental. Deal 5 damage to enemy minions around it.

name: Gravity Well
description: Summon four joined 0/1 Walls with Provoke.

name: Blazing Spines
description: Summon two joined 3/3 Walls that can attack.

name: Bonechill Barrier
description: Summon three joined 0/2 Vespyr Walls.  Minions that attack these walls are Stunned.

name: Polarity
description: Switch ANY minion's Attack and Health.

name: Bone Swarm
description: Deal 2 damage to the enemy General and all enemy minions around them.

name: Fountain of Youth
description: Fully heal all friendly minions.

name: Inner Oasis
description: Give all friendly minions +3 Health. Draw a card.

name: Rite Of The Undervault
description: Draw to fill your action bar.

name: Heaven's Eclipse
description: Draw 3 spell cards from your deck.

name: Mind Steal
description: Steal a random minion from your opponent's deck and summon it.

name: Egg Morph
description: Turn a non-Egg minion into an Egg, or hatch an Egg.

name: Aerial Rift
description: Give your minions Airdrop this turn.  Draw a card.

name: Hailstone Prison
description: Return ANY minion to its action bar.

name: Magnetize
description: Pull ANY minion to the space in front of your General.

name: Kinetic Equilibrium
description: Deal 2 damage to ALL minions in a 3x3 area. Friendly minions in the area also gain +2 Attack.

name: Spirit of the Wild
description: Reactivate friendly minions on your opponent's starting side of the battlefield.

name: Cryogenesis
description: Deal 4 damage to an enemy minion. Draw a Vespyr minion from your deck.

name: Consuming Rebirth
description: Destroy a friendly minion. At the end of your turn, re-summon it on the same space and give it +1/+1.

name: Mist Walking
description: Teleport your General up to 2 spaces.

name: Killing Edge
description: Give a friendly minion +4/+2. If that minion has Backstab, draw a card at end of turn.

name: Skywind Glaives
description: Friendly minions nearby your General gain +2 Attack.

name: Soul Grimwar
description: Your General gains, "Deathwatch: Gains +2 Attack."

name: Sunstone Bracers
description: Your General gains +1 Attack.

name: Horn of the Forsaken
description: Whenever your General deals damage, summon a 1/1 Wraithling nearby your General.

name: Staff Of Y'Kir
description: Your General gains +2 Attack.

name: Mask of Shadows
description: Your General gains Backstab (4).

name: Wildfire Ankh
description: Your General gains Blast.

name: Cyclone Mask
description: Your General gains Ranged.

name: Bloodrage Mask
description: Whenever you cast a spell, deal 1 damage to the enemy General.

name: Hexblade
description: Your General gains +3 Attack. Whenever your General damages an enemy minion, its Attack becomes 1.

name: Adamantite Claws
description: Your General gains +4 Attack.

name: Iridium Scale
description: Your General gains Frenzy.

name: Spectral Blade
description: Your General gains +2 Attack. Whenever your General destroys an enemy minion, restore 2 Health to your General.

name: Snowpiercer
description: Your General gains +3 Attack.

name: Coldbiter
description: At the end of your turn, your General deals 2 damage to each enemy minion around them.

name: Twin Fang
description: Whenever a friendly minion or your General takes damage, your General gains +2 Attack.

name: Arclyte Regalia
description: Your General gains +2 Attack. The first time your General takes damage each turn, prevent 2 of it.

name: Winterblade
description: Your General gains +2 Attack. Enemy minions damaged by your General are Stunned.
